column1: プルルルル……プルルルル……プルルルル……ピ

プロデューサーさん！
新しいお店がオープンしましたよ！
column2:
Producer-san!
A new store just opened up!
column5:
Producer-san!
A new store has opened!

column1:
なんでも女の子に人気の、癒しのアイテムが揃って
いるみたいです。みんなにも役立つかもしれません
column2:
They sell healing items, and the ones popular 
with women. They might be useful for everyone.
column5:
There are all sorts of healing items that are
popular with girls. They might be useful.

column1:
本当ですか、ありがとうございます！
この後、リサーチしに行こうと思います
column3:
Really, thank you very much!
I will go do some research after this.
column5:
Really? Thank you very much!
I think I'll go do some research after this.
